name: Diapers
description: Client (26 y/o) is a full-time caregiver to her two children aged 2 years old and 2 months old. The family is living in a rental flat, with the husband being the sole breadwinner. Client will require assistance in getting diapers (Size S and XL - 4 packets of each size).

passiton.name: Reusable cloth diapers
passiton.description:
These are reusable cloth diapers , never been used,

Need to be washed  & dried before use, 

The elastics may need some rework. 

If you need help with the rework, there are organisations that might be handy. 
But work is required to clean them and reuse the each time . 

They are quality materials, Please only take them if you truly can use them, 

The number given on the site, is a Whatsapp  number only.

name: Diapers
description: Mother of three requires XL and XXL diapers for her 4 and 5 year old child who are undergoing toilet training. Family comes from a low income background and she would appreciate diapers for a period of two months while she awaits the outcome of her SSO financial application.

passiton.name: Reusable cloth diapers

name: Diapers
description:
Client is a 30-year-old single father dedicated to caring for his 2-year-old daughter after his wife has left. Currently, he is working in food delivery, with his parents helping to look after his daughter during his shifts. However, the client is concerned about his parents’ declining health, which may affect their ability to assist him.

To support his family during this challenging time, Client is seeking assistance with essentials such as diapers and milk powder. This support would greatly help alleviate some financial pressure as he navigates parenting and work.

Diapers- FairPrice Baby Dry Diaper Pants (Size L)
specifications: FairPrice Baby Dry Diaper Pants (Size L)

contact.org: Montfort Care - Marine Parade Family Service Centre
contact.name: Elvira Rajoo

name: Diapers
description:
Low-income mother of 3 requires support in attaining diapers for her 2 young kids (2y/o and 1 month old). Her husband is a sole breadwinner and has to support his 6 other children. This additional support would mean a lot for the couple in this current times. 

- 2 packets of XL Pull Up diapers (any brand)
- 2 packets of infant diapers (any brand)

For more information, please contact Hanna at 8878 8846 or hanna@newlifestories.org.sg. Thank you.

name: Diapers
description: A single-parent family with a 4-months old baby. Child is requiring Huggies Nature diapers due to sensitive skin. His mother is unable to look for a job at the moment as she still need to go through a series of medical appointments due to bleeding issues after childbirth. Family is only depending on the meager income of the grandfather who earns around $1000/month which is barely enough to meet their daily basic needs.

contact.org: Singapore Children’s Society - Community Services & Programmes @ Children’s Society
contact.name: Katherine Ofiaza

name: Diapers
description: A 4-months old baby is requiring Huggies Nature diapers due to eczema. His mother, 23 years old, is a single mother and is still looking for a job. Child has yet to be placed in an infantcare so that his mother will be able to find a job.

name: Bicycle
description: The client resides with 6 of her children. The household faces financial difficulties, client prioritizing providing children's basic needs - while having accumulated outstanding debts. This is especially so as 4 children are still studying, while her older 2 children are not working presently and she is the sole breadwinner. Considering their financially tight situation, the family wishes to request for a bicycle through PIO. We would be grateful if the donor can provide/pay for delivery of the bicycle to the client.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

passiton.name: Children bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: Dining Table
description: Family of 8 living in 2-room rental. Father suffered from stroke and therefore has been unable to secure employment. Mother is the sole caregiver of the whole family. For further liaison, kindly contact Harsheni at 81383741, thank you!

passiton.name: White dining table including chairs
passiton.description: While dining table including 6 chairs, one chair's surface slightly peeled off

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is a cancer patient diagnosed with colorectal cancer (stage 4). His cancer has spread after almost 2 years of treatment and has worsened. He is unfit to work, and his wife is looking after him. Client requires a wheelchair to aid mobility and allow him to travel for his cancer treatments with ease.
specifications: Standard size for adult, preferably with higher back height

passiton.name: Motorised Wheelchair
passiton.description: The 2 back wheels need replacement. I can pay for the repair cost but would request receiving party to arrange the repair for me. Thanks in advance.

name: Wheelchair
description: Member is a middle-aged lady who is suffering from fits and spine issues. As she is not a citizen, her medical bills have been causing significant strain for herself and her husband. As she is unable to walk/stand for extended periods, having a wheelchair will help her to move from home to the hospital more safely.

passiton.name: Motorised Wheelchair
passiton.description: The 2 back wheels need replacement. I can pay for the repair cost but would request receiving party to arrange the repair for me. Thanks in advance.

name: Motorised wheelchair
description:
An elderly client is caring for an adult child with multiple medical conditions who needs to be assisted with a wheelchair. 
Elderly also suffers from a medical condition that doesn’t allow her to walk for too long. As such, it has been difficult pushing her adult daughter in the wheelchair. 
As such, a motorized wheelchair with the ability to take a weight of 160kg will provide the elderly relief from the strain of pushing her adult child and it will help increase the mobility of the family. Especially when going for multiple medical appointments.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: Motorised Wheelchair
passiton.description: The 2 back wheels need replacement. I can pay for the repair cost but would request receiving party to arrange the repair for me. Thanks in advance.
